channel.title: Smine Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.3.5(Fix problem that loading album images is slow while scrolling. Fix bug in random play order. Modify send to playlist Menus. Save config when playlist changed.)
item.description:
• Fix problem that loading album images is slow while scrolling.
  • Fix bug in random play order.
  • Modify send to playlist Menus.
  • Save config when playlist changed.
